mapper.select: SELECT /* com.deft.crud.estimate.model.dao.EstimateMapper#selectEstimateList() */ E.ESTIMATE_NO , C.CUSTOMER_NAME , E.ESTIMATE_TITLE , E.ESTIMATE_STATUS , EI.EMP_NAME , TO_CHAR(E.ESTIMATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "ESTIMATE_DATE" FROM TBL_ESTIMATE E LEFT JOIN TBL_CUSTOMER C ON (E.CUSTOMER_NO = C.CUSTOMER_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_EMP_INFO EI ON (C.EMP_NO = EI.EMP_NO) WHERE C.EMP_NO = ${ empNo } ORDER BY E.ESTIMATE_NO DESC

SELECT /* com.deft.crud.estimate.model.dao.EstimateMapper#selectEstimateListByStatus() */ E.ESTIMATE_NO , C.CUSTOMER_NAME , E.ESTIMATE_TITLE , E.ESTIMATE_STATUS , EI.EMP_NAME , TO_CHAR(E.ESTIMATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "ESTIMATE_DATE" FROM TBL_ESTIMATE E LEFT JOIN TBL_CUSTOMER C ON (E.CUSTOMER_NO = C.CUSTOMER_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_EMP_INFO EI ON (C.EMP_NO = EI.EMP_NO) WHERE C.EMP_NO = #{ empNo }
AND E.ESTIMATE_STATUS = '진행중'
AND E.ESTIMATE_STATUS = '완료'
AND E.ESTIMATE_STATUS = '보류'
AND E.ESTIMATE_STATUS = '실패'
ORDER BY E.ESTIMATE_NO DESC

SELECT /* com.deft.crud.estimate.model.dao.EstimateMapper#selectEstimateDetail() */ E.ESTIMATE_NO , E.ESTIMATE_TITLE , TO_CHAR(E.ESTIMATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "ESTIMATE_DATE" , E.CUSTOMER_NO , C.CUSTOMER_NAME , CC.COMPANY_NAME , C.EMP_NO , EI.EMP_NAME , J.JOB_NAME , E.ESTIMATE_STATUS , E.DISCOUNT_RATE , P.PRODUCT_NO , P.PRODUCT_NAME , P.SELLING_PRICE , P.UNIT , EP.PRODUCT_AMOUNT FROM TBL_ESTIMATE E LEFT JOIN TBL_CUSTOMER C ON (E.CUSTOMER_NO = C.CUSTOMER_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_CUSTOMER_COMPANY CC ON (C.CUSTOMER_COMPANY_NO = CC.CUSTOMER_COMPANY_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_EMP_INFO EI ON (C.EMP_NO = EI.EMP_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_JOB J ON (EI.JOB_CODE = J.JOB_CODE) LEFT JOIN TBL_ESTIMATE_PRODUCT EP ON (E.ESTIMATE_NO = EP.ESTIMATE_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_PRODUCT P ON (EP.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO) WHERE E.ESTIMATE_NO = #{ estimateNo }
SELECT /* com.deft.crud.estimate.model.dao.EstimateMapper#selectLastEstimateSeq() */ LPAD(LAST_NUMBER, 3, 0) FROM USER_SEQUENCES WHERE SEQUENCE_NAME = 'SEQ_ESTIMATE_NO'
